Tip: Build land near your opponent's orb.
Tip: Kill Thorn Wisps before they grow.
Tip: There are 4 colors in Faeria. Each color has its own land type.
Tip: Ruunin is the ancient, undying guardian of the forest.
Tip: Red cards use the power of fiery mountains.
Seifer has burned his name into the ashes of broken kingdoms.
Tip: Creatures with Jump can move up to 2 spaces in any direction, jumping over obstacles.
Tip: Build lands to block Aquatic enemies.
Tip: Khalim is aggressive. Defend your orb carefully.
When she was only a child, Sharra's fear burned away with her village.
Magda is the Queen of Meroval. Heroes and villains are mere tools in her grand schemes.
From miles away, Krog's dance parties are often mistaken for distant thunder.
Tarum was the first seed planted. He has seen the birth of dragons and the fall of ancient gods.
Tip: Tarum's power grows over time. Defeat him quickly.
Hoaka constantly invents new boards to play on.
Aurora's hobbies include mentoring future heroes and tasting new kinds of tea.
A prodigy of the Djidan order, Khalim defied his masters and entered a worldly war.
Some fish just want to watch the world burn.
The mysterious Jalmyr watches over the cosmos and plays tutor to gods.
Tip: Treasures are powerful cards normally found in Pandora.
Fugoro travels the world collecting history's greatest relics.
Tip: Deathtouch only kills a creature if damage is dealt. Protection stops damage.
Tip: Tiki Caretaker and Tiki Piper can target themselves.
Tip: Frogs from Battle Toads can only be summoned on lakes.
Tip: You cannot heal yourself over 20 life.
Tip: Completing Solo content is the best way to get started.
Tip: Red is the color of fire and war.
Tip: Blue is the color of transformation and trickery.
Tip: Green is the color of growth and wild predators.
Tip: Yellow is the color of wind and speed.
Tip: You can't charge through other creatures.
Tip: Build lands to block aquatic enemies.
Tip: The most effective way to gain battle chests is to come back every day and complete your daily quest.
Did you know: faeria.com/the-hub is our official site where players publish their own guides
Tip: Complete all of solo mode to unlock the Dragon cardback.
Tip: When Pandora awakens, all faeria wells are destroyed but players get double faeria each turn.
Tip: Creatures with Taunt are often the best way to protect yourself.
Tip: Build lands in the early game. Save the +1 card and +1 faeria buttons for later.
Tip: Many decks build up powerful late-game threats. Save removal for them.
Tip: When playing against rush, move your creatures onto their aggressive lands.
Tip: Structures can be played on lands of any color.
Tip: Structures can be activated on the turn they were summoned.
Tip: Try to build lands adjacent to your enemy's god.
Tip: You can only hold 9 cards at a time. Excess cards are destroyed when drawn.
Tip: Defeat rush players by blocking their aggressive lands. Counter-attack before they can break through.
If you harm a yak, you harm the world\nSyland saying
Tip: Ranged creatures can't shoot through friendly units.
Tip: Creating lands is often more important than drawing cards.
Tip: Many threats will punish you for stalling. Once have an advantage, attack!
Tip: Once your deck runs out of cards, you take increasing damage each draw.
Jalmyr's progressive puzzles often perplex the most proficient players.
Fed by faeria, imperial steam forges are unpredictable but effective.
Jalmyr could not bring himself to fully destroy his brother, the lord of darkness.
Tip: Yellow decks often use Haste creatures. Set up defenses ahead of time.
Tip: Red decks often use direct damage. Be careful when you're at low life.
Tip: Fire Storm is a red card that can deal 3 damage to all enemy creatures.
Tip: Many avatars have unique emotes.
Tip: A taunted creature cannot move itself, but it can be moved by another effect. Even Dash.
Tip: Be careful before boosting a creature beyond 6/6. Removal can punish you.
Tip: Got a question or comment? Join the official Faeria Discord server. A link's in your friend's list.
Tip: Go to esports.faeria.com for information on faeria tournaments and prizes.
Tip: Each season, the top 10 players in god rank are invited to a special tournament
Tip: The best removal card costs about 6 faeria to play.
Tip: When playing against burn decks, end the game as fast as possible.
If you like faeria, don't forget to leave a review. It helps grow the community.
The most feared sight in a seaside village is not a tsunami, but a grinning fish.
Tip: Tips are sometimes shown during loading screens.
Tip: Don't let your opponent get lands next to your god.
The Emperor looks forward to the day when citizens are no longer necessary.
Tip: Wise players rarely use the Wisdom card.
Before Iona the Shaytan had no word for 'mercy'.
The Outland Rangers are an ancient order of nobles that traded stone castles for open sky.
Without fail, each generation of syland farmers gives birth to a great hero.
It's the dream of every bard to compose a tribute worthy of Iona.

Krog mostly just goes around *telling* everyone he's the ogre king.
Some fish just want to watch the world burn.
Thyrian Golems are said to come from a mythical paradise above the clouds.
King Yaknus, first of his name, is known as the breaker of yokes and the beast of all burdens.
As a boy Magnus was sent a dream by Aurora, which led him to the crown.
Despite her protests, Ruunin's followers insist on honorably burying her each time she dies.
Rumor has it that Jalmyr will grant a wish to any that can teach him something new.
Garudan is kind of a jerk.

In the hands of the Sagami, the most hideous spirits become sacred guardians.
The Sagami bind murderous spirits as sacred guardians.
Seifer has a pet ferret named Deathspark.
Seifer once challenged the sun to a staring contest. History does not record the winner.
Tip: Creatures in empty ocean tiles without flying or aquatic die at the end of their controller's turn.
Pandora is the world where dreams happens. Thankfully, gods are allowed to enter it.
Thanks to her ability to enter persons' dreams, Aurora can change one's destiny.
Tip: If several creatures are taunting the same creature, that creature can attack any of the taunts.
Tip: You can hold your Explore card to buff your event-based creatures later.
Tip: Falcon Dive is an excellent, versatile tool that can be included in almost any deck.
Tip: Syland Horsemaster allows Green and Red decks to make surprise attacks.
Tip: God Hunter can't attack or move if there is a taunt creature nearby.
Tip: Unlikely Hero's ability can be activated by hitting the opponent's orb.
Tip: Moving a creature with a card takes into account its Jump and Charge abilities.
Tip: Radiance is not affected by cost reduction cards.
Tip: Elementals are a great way to accelerate your special land production.
Tip: Accumulate Pandora Points each season to win special prizes.
Tip: End each season at Rank 15 or better to earn a special card back.
Tip: Reach God rank to receive a unique golden card back each season.
Tip: Ranked and Pandora seasons reset on the first Monday of every month.
Tip: Creatures harvest Faeria from left to right, top to bottom, from the active player's perspective.
Tip: Transforming a creature with Haste can remove its Haste property and make it unable to attack.
Tip: If your opponent land-locks you, move a creature on to one of their lands and create one of your own on an empty ocean tile.
Tip: You cannot cancel playing a creature with a Gift effect once you place it on board
Orosei keeps watch over the realm of Pandora and its treasures.
Fugoro pillages treasures from the realm of Pandora.

Defeat all of the World Bosses to unlock the Orb of Champions and its 3 Jewels.
All coloured lands count as wild lands when paying land costs.
Tip: Corrupt creatures love movement tricks!
Tip: Don't let enemy creatures Corrupt your lands!
You can practice tournament format games in private lobby with friends.
Corruption spreads in Oversky ever since Kaios ate the fruit of Everlife.
Some cards gain tribal benefits. Yaks love forming a herd <3.
